candidateId.title: Candidate Id
candidateId.description: The id of the candidate applying for a job

status.title: Application Status
status.description: Application status: 0 - Open; 1 - Disqualified; 2 - Closed; 3 - Withdraw; 4 - Saved; 5 - Not Applied; 6 - Draft Application

hiredOn.title: Applicant Hired Date
hiredOn.description: Date on which the applicant was hired

exportedOn.title: Applicant Exported Date
exportedOn.description: date on which the applicant was exported

snapshotAt.title: Snapshot Date
snapshotAt.description: snapshot date of the application. Details from candidate profile are copied over to corresponding application fields.

countryCode.title: Country Code
countryCode.description: maps to standard application field ‘country’. This is a special field. Mix of ISO country code and option ids from ‘country’ picklist.

usersSysId.title: User Sys Id
usersSysId.description: users sys id for an internal applicant

publicIntranet.title: Public Intranet
publicIntranet.description: If true it means that this application was made by a candidate from the public intranet career site.

guid.title: Id for imported application
guid.description: external job application id for imported applications

nonApplicantStatus.title: Non applicant status
nonApplicantStatus.description: if the candidate has applied or not: 0 - UNDEFINED; 1- ACTIVE_STATUS; 2- INVITED_STATUS

urlHash.title: Commuted Hash
urlHash.description: Commuted hash from private URL. This is copied to the db if user chooses to save the job and apply later.

resumeUploadedAt.title: Resume uploaded date
resumeUploadedAt.description: date on which the resume was uploaded to the JAM group

dataSource.title: Data Source
dataSource.description: Source of the application: 0 - SF_ONLY (SF internal and user entry through SF only. No external partner data source); 1 - LINKED_IN

anonymized.title: Anonymized Flag
anonymized.description: The candidate solr search is controlled based on this flag. Only non-anonymized candidates are searchable: (0 or null) - Non-anonymized; 1 - Anonymized

locale.title: Application Locale
locale.description: Locale used for the application. This is used for passing the application locale to VI while initiating on-boarding request and background check request.

profileUpdated.title: Is Profile Updated
profileUpdated.description: This is used in multi-stage application to indicate to the operator in the candidate summary page that the candidate has updated the application: 0 - not updated; 1 - updated

duplicateProfile.title: Duplicate Profile
duplicateProfile.description: indicate job application is no longer relevant because it came from a duplicate candidate profile that has been merged using the Candidate Merge feature

modifiedOnBehalfOf.title: Proxy User
modifiedOnBehalfOf.description: The proxy user who last modified the job application

owner.title: Owner
owner.description: owner for purposes of calculating referral bonus

candConversionProcessed.title: Candidate Conversion Process
candConversionProcessed.description: Whether candidate profile conversion job has processed this application

candTypeWhenHired.title: Candidate Type when hired
candTypeWhenHired.description: Indicated whether the applicant was internal, external or alumni when user was marked as hired

timeToHire.title: Time to hire
timeToHire.description: calculated based on admin recruiting setting for job application, represents Time taken to hire a candidate

personId.title: Person id
personId.description: PersonId column to store person id for internal applicants

segment.title: Segment id
segment.description: Stores the segment id of the job application. segment id is the id of a subsidiary which the job application belongs to.

modifiedBy.title: Last Modified by
modifiedBy.description: The user who last modified the job application

modifiedAt.title: Last Modified Date
modifiedAt.description: date on which the application was last modified

psRoleMotivation.title: Motivation/Reason for pursuing a new role

custUS3.title: Are you a citizen or permanent resident of Iran, Syria, North Korea, Cuba, Sudan, or the Crimea region of Ukraine?

custUS1.title: Are you currently authorized to work in the U.S.?

custUS2.title: Do you now or will you in the future require sponsorship for employment visa status?

completedMilliaryServiceTaiwan.title: Have you completed Milliary service in Taiwan

minimumLegalAge.title: Do you meet the minimum legal employable age

veteranActq1.title: Please select one of the following in regard to your Protected Veteran status:

evergreenConsent.title:
Corning may have other openings for this job in other cities and/or countries.  If you would like to give your consent for Corning to use your application for this position as an application for those other jobs in addition to this one, please select “Yes” below.  If you select “Yes,” recruiting personnel will use your application information to create and submit applications for those other jobs in your name.  
If you select “No” below, you will need to apply separately for each specific location and role in which you are interested.  
Whether you select “Yes” or “No,” you can withdraw your applications (both applications that you submit, and, if you select “Yes,” any that Corning personnel submit on your behalf) at any time.  To do so, log into Corning’s job application webpage https://corningjobs.corning.com/ and select “My Account, Sign In”, then open the specific Job to click the “Withdraw Application” button.  
Please note that if you withdraw your application, Corning may already have processed (reviewed or used) your information.  Any processing prior to withdrawal is lawful based on your original consent before you withdrew the application.

eeParticipation.title: Do you wish to furnish this information

legalInCanada.title: Are you legally entitled to work in Canada

nonCompeteAgreement.title: Are you subject to any non-compete agreement(s) or other restrictions that may conflict with employment at Corning

offerContactPerson.title: Name of Person Receiving Acceptance Documents

offerContactEmail.title: Email of Person Receiving Acceptance Documents

enrolledWaiverProgram.title: If answered no, are you enrolled to a waiver program

nonCompeteAgreementDetails.title: If yes, please provide details on your non-compete restrictions

ethnicityA.title: Based on this definition, choose the correct selection

RCM_ovm.title: OVM (lump sum in lieu of base pay)

formerEmployeeDetails.title: If yes, please provide the employer(s) name(s), date(s), location(s) and position(s) held

disabilityq1.title: Please check one of the boxes below:

sponsorship.title: Will you now or in the future require sponsorship for employment visa status

raceA.title: Based on this definition, choose the correct selection

preferredLanguageONB.title: Indicate New Hire's Preferred Language for Onboarding

formerEmployee1.title: Have you ever worked for Corning or any of it's affliates as an employee or a contractor previously

vendorApplicantId.title: Vendor Applicant ID
vendorApplicantId.description: Id provided by the vendor in response

orderNo.title: Order No
orderNo.description: Order number provided by vendor upon onboarding initiation

vendor.title: Vendor
vendor.description: Account identification provided by the vendor

accountId.title: Account ID
accountId.description: Account identification provided by the vendor

createdBy.title: Onboarding creation done by
createdBy.description: User id of the person who created

createdAt.title: Onboarding creation date
createdAt.description: Date when the record is created

version.title: Onboarding Version
version.description: Onboarding version used while initiating onboarding process for an applicant from BizX

statusId.title: Onboarding Status ID
statusId.description: Unique Identifier of Onboarding Status record.

type.title: Onboarding Type
type.description: Type of onboarding process like Form,Task etc.,

name.title: Onboarding Name
name.description: Name of onboarding. Emergency Contact form, Direct Deposit Form, I-9 Employee form

statusType.title: Onboarding Status Type
statusType.description: Onboarding status type like form or task

status.title: Onboarding Status
status.description: Status of onboarding. Pass, partial, inprogress, reviewed etc.

vendor.title: Vendor
vendor.description: Vendor information like VI or LN

accountId.title: Account Id
accountId.description: Account identification provided by the vendor

packageId.title: Package Id
packageId.description: Package id provided by the vendor

createdBy.title: Created By
createdBy.description: User id of the person who created

createdAt.title: Created Date
createdAt.description: Date when the record is created

modifiedAt.title: Last Modified Date
modifiedAt.description: Date when the record is updated

name.title: Background Check Name
name.description: Name of the check type like education, work experience etc.

status.title: Background Check Status
status.description: This is the status of the background check like in progress/Pass/Fail

type.title: Background Check Type
type.description: Flag to indentify if this is a overall status or individual status update : 0 - overall, 1 -individual

screeningType.title: Background Screening Type
screeningType.description: To identify if this is an overall status or individual status for each element

orderStatus.title: Background Order Status
orderStatus.description: This is the check status of the background check

score.title: Overall Skill Score
score.description: Overall Skill score for this application

industry.title: Industry Name
industry.description: Store the industry information from Resume.

modifiedAt.title: Last Modified Date
modifiedAt.description: Date on which the Profile was last modified

validated.title: Validated
validated.description: Boolean whether the skill set has been validated.

id.title: Assessment Order ID
id.description: Unique identifier for a assessment order

associationId.title: Assessment Association ID
associationId.description: assessment association reference for this order

createdBy.title: Assessment Order Created By
createdBy.description: Created By field, records User Sys Id of the user who has created the record

createdAt.title: Assessment Order Creation Date
createdAt.description: Created Date field, records transaction date when the record was created

modifiedBy.title: Assessment Order Last Modified By
modifiedBy.description: Last Modified Date By field, records User Sys Id of the user who has modified the record last time

modifiedAt.title: Assessment Order Last Modification Date
modifiedAt.description: Last Modified Date field, records transaction date when the record was modified last time

type.title: Revision Type
type.description: revision type: 0 - when application status was modified by system, 1 - for application status changes made by job req operator

statusId.title: Application Status Set Item Id
statusId.description: the application status of the application

createdAt.title: Created Date
createdAt.description: date on which this record was created

createdBy.title: Created By
createdBy.description: user who created this record. For system statuses, this is set to v4admin

modifiedAt.title: Last Modified Date
modifiedAt.description: the date on which the status was last modified

modifiedBy.title: Last Modified By
modifiedBy.description: the user who last modified the application status. For system statuses, this is set to v4admin

skipped.title: Skipped Status
skipped.description: if this application status was skipped: 0 - Not skipped; 1 - Skipped status and the logged in user has the selectable by permission value; 2 - Skipped status but the logged in user does not have the selectable by permission value

id.description: Unique identifier for snapshot application background information

score.title: Individual Skill Score
score.description: Value between 0-1 - expresses the strength of a suggested skill

assignmentMode.title: Assignment Mode
assignmentMode.description: How the skill was assigned - EXTRACTED(1), MANUAL(2), SUGGESTED(3)

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: In order to define a given skill priority - PRIMARY(0), SECONDARY(1)

context.title: Skill Context

content.description: The actual content of the comment

modifiedBy.title: Last Modified By
